title: My computer crash and this put me in low priority Queue! (CLOSE TO GET BAN) !HELP!
body: Hi,since i change place, my computer and connection is not doing well. I recently got put in Low priority queue for 20 min for 5 game but i think that next time its a 2 week ban. I know that its annoying to my teammate to see me disconnect and loose cause of that but i can't really do anything about it. I'm trying my best to work on it and finding a way to fix it but until that i don't want to get ban cause this is my main account and i spend a lot of money on it. Can you guys help me about it and delete the low priority queue and make me so i cant get ban from disconnecting or crashing. PLS i love this game so much and i'm tired of waiting all this time before doing a game.

replies.body: I also had this happen to me, but I haven't played lol in nearly 2 months. I moved, and when setting up the internet it crashed. I come back onto league and it says i have 5 20 minute ques? why so long if i havent even played in months? i didnt have any ques when i stopped playing either. I was well aware of LeaverBuster

You shouldn't be getting any type of ban due to disconnections. It's unfortunate that it's caused you to end up with those LPQ's but rest assured it won't escalate to a ban.

With that being said, let's try to troubleshoot why you keep losing your connection in the first place. You might just need to update a few [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure that your connection isn't being blocked by something like a firewall or incorrect DNS settings. Test it in a custom/practice game and let me know if it helps!
